Description: Sandstone relief-block depicting the hand and part of the wing of Isis and the back of a lion-throne.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Meroë (historic - Nubia), Chapel N17 Rear wall
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2007 9 Mar-3 Sept, Belgium, Musee Royal de Mariemont, 'Pharaons noirs Sur la Piste des Quarante Jours' 2010, Mar, Paris, Louvre. 11/3/10 -6/10/10
